metadata.title: Artificial Intelligence in Dental Education: A Scoping Review of Applications, Challenges, and Gaps Mohammed El-Hakim * , Robert Anthonappa and Amr Fawzy University of Western Australia, Dental School, Perth, WA 6009, Australia; robert.anthonappa@uwa.edu.au (R.A.);

abstract.first_50_chars: Academic Editors: Hans S. Malmstrom and Denis Bour
abstract.last_50_chars: AI application and evaluation in dental education.

methods.heading: Methods
methods.first_sentence: elaborated Feedback (eF) and Knowledge of Results (KOR) on radiographic diagnostic competencies in dental students, and to evaluate the diagnostic accuracy of an AI system (dentalXrai Pro 3.0) as a potential educational aid.

methods.last_100_chars: , and item agreement. Included test-retest reliability analysis. Limitations Findings Scoping Review
